title: Affytechan
wikitext:
'''Affytechans''' (Plant People)
'''Homeworld:''' [[Dom-Bradden]], also known as [[Bradden]], was a planet in the [[Outer Rim]].
'''Affytechans'''
Affytechans were a species of tall, bipedal sentient plants native to [[Dom-Bradden]], on the [[Outer Rim]] of the galaxy.

'''Biology & Appearance:'''
Each Affytechan had a unique growth of leaves, petals, tassels, and tendrils. Although beautiful to the Human eye, they stank to the Human nostril. Affytechans had a normal body temperature of 83 degrees.

'''History:'''
A number of Affytechans were abducted to the [[Eye of Palpatine]] and mindwashed into believing themselves Imperial naval crewmen of the vessel, consulting blank computer screens and carrying brooms and mops as blasters. These included [[Breen]], who believed himself an Imperial medic and was recruited by [[Luke Skywalker]] to locate transports off the Eye.

'''''Attribute Dice:''''' 12D
'''Dexterity:'''2D/3D+2
'''Knowledge:''' 2D+2/4D
'''Mechanical:''' 2D/3D
'''Perception:''' 2D+1/4D+1
'''Strength:''' 3D/5D
'''Technical:'''1D/3D

'''Special Abilities:'''
*'''Slow:''' +4 to the difficulty for running and climbing/jumping attempts *'''Fire Vulnerability:''' Damage from fire increased by +3D *'''Extra Body parts:''' The ambidextrous tendrils (heavy manipulator) and leaves (fine manipulator) of the Affytechans can be used as hands without dexterity penalty for multible actions. *'''Heavy Bark:''' The Affytechan bark provides +1D phyical damage resistance. *'''Plant traits:''' They need very little to survive.

'''Move:''' 10/12
'''Average Height:''' Varies by Individual (estimated 1 meter to 3 meters or more)
